## Personal Information We Collect

Botize.com may collect, store and process various kinds of data, with
different legal grounds, as listed below.

For the categories of data that
require your consent, we will actively ask you for consent before collecting
any data.

The following is a list of data we collect, process or store, with the purpose
and legal ground listed for each item or group of items having the same
purpose and legal ground:

  * **User account information.
** Users that choose to register in Botize.com, will have to provide a valid email address.

** Customers that choose to purchase a paid version of the Services provide Botize.com (and our payment processors) with billing details such as credit card information, billing email, banking information, location at the time of transaction and/or a billing address.

Collecting this
information is required for performing the contract we entered into with you,
at your request (our Terms of Service) cf.
** When you as a user interact with the Services, we collect metadata to provide additional context about the way the Service is being used.

The usage data may include your IP address, browser type and version, operating system, referral source, length of visit, page views and website navigation paths, as well as information about the timing, frequency and pattern of your service use.
The source of the usage data is our server software and our analytics tracking system.
** Like most digital services, our servers automatically collect information when you access or use our Websites or Services and record it in log files.

This log data may include the Internet Protocol (IP) address, the address of the web page visited within the Services, browser type and settings, the date and time the Services were used, information about browser configuration and plugins, language preferences and cookie data.

** Botize.com may collect information about devices used to access the Services, including type of device, what operating system is used, device settings, application IDs, unique device identifiers and crash data.
Whether we collect some or all of this information depends on the type of device used and its settings.
** We may process information that you send to us, should you chose to submit a ticket to our support email.

Collecting this information it is required for performing the contract we entered into with you, at your request (our Terms of Service), as well as our legitimate interest of handling your requests cf.

The legal grounds for collecting this information is that it is required for
performing our commitment about communicating changes in plans and pricing to
you in the contract we entered into with you, at your request (our Terms of
Service) cf.

## How We Use the Information We Collect

Botize collects this personal data for the following purposes:

  * Login to Botize
  * Possibility to reset a password in case of forgetting it
  * Informing users about executions of active scenarios
  * Informing users about business matters
  * Informing users and potential users about new features of Botize

## How We Store Your Personal Data

We are committed to doing our very best to protect your data and keep it
confidential.

## Sobre los datos de los usuarios

En conformidad con lo previsto en la Ley Orgánica 15/1999, del 13 de
diciembre, de Protección de Datos de Carácter Personal (LOPD), los gestores de
botize.com informan de la existencia de un fichero de su titularidad en el
cual se incluirán los datos necesarios para mantener informados a los usuarios
que así lo requieran o proporcionar los servicios que los usuarios soliciten.

## Privacidad

Los ficheros de botize.com no contienen datos de carácter privado ni requieren
información para identificar personas físicas.

## How we share information

We do not sell, rent, or otherwise disclose your personal information to third
parties for their marketing and advertising purposes.

Non-personal information generated by this cookie about your use
of Botize is transmitted to and stored by Google on servers in the United
States.

We use third party service providers to facilitate or outsource one or more
aspects of our business and therefore we may provide some of your personal
information directly to these service providers.

These service providers are
subject to confidentiality agreements with us and other legal restrictions
that prohibit their use of the information we provide them for any other
purpose except to facilitate the specific outsourced Botize.com related
operation, unless you have given your prior permission to them for additional
uses.

We share our data, including personal information about you with our partners
and joint ventures in furtherance of our business.

To the extent that these
entities have access to your information, they will treat it at least as
protectively as they treat information they obtain from their other users.
